review: The only thing missing is volume control on the remote.  Love it!
author: Linda

review: Enjoy the stick, we daycare for our grandson and we enjoy the children  programs.  A great alternative to cable tv.
author: gregory m mitchell

review: Very much like the Firestick. Easily hooked up and started.  My only complaint is that the menu system confuses my elderly parents. The consistently go to the Amazon content when they're trying to access Netflix.
author: Matthew Horton

review: Easy to use.  WiFi works better then I expected. Clear picture. No lag. Deff recommend  I'm a Netflix hbogo junkie. Both work great on the fire stick.
author: Christopher S

review: Received Amazon shipment MUCH sooner than expected. The Amazon Fire TV Stick meets/exceeds all of my expectations!
author: Stephanie Gates

review: When watching videos the fire stick does really well. The problem I have with the tv stick is that the font is really small when used with a small screen tv. We on fast internet 60MB download speed so your result may not be the same.
author: aperturefocus "aperturefocus"

review: Did not have as many channels as others I've seen
author: bridgette jones

review: This is amazing, and cheap.  We cut the cord with this thing.
author: Cathleen Mayo "DoodleBug Book Author"

review: Arrival was on time, set up was easy and so far there has been no problems. Keep up the good work.
author: Sharon Jones
